text: Have you addressed the tamper alert on batch B-ABC-67890?
Yes, we have investigated. It was a false positive during routine inspection. The batch is secure.
Thank you for confirming. Yes, please proceed with the submission for batch B-ABC-67890.
Shipment for B-MNO-33445 is ready for transit. What is the destination?
Destination is General Hospital. Please ensure temperature is maintained at 5Â°C.
Okay, sounds good. I will get the truck ready for pickup.
We are running low on Amoxicillin, can you expedite?
I see that. I will check with production and get back to you shortly.
